Hello Jammers!

Thanks for visiting my page.  This got beyond my scope!  I got the prototype working with the PacMan "turorial" page and just didn't get into the level design. I was hopeful to have badges to earn through objectives, and a few more levels to play.

Thanks for visiting my page and playing MAIL SNAIL!
